system.requirements:
Tier 1; None
Aptitudes: Fellowship, Social, Nurgle
system.effect:
Character gains +10 to all Intimidate Tests but suffers -10 to Fellowship Tests when dealing with others in a non-threatening manner, such as animals, children, or the easily startled. 
When using the Command Skill's Special use "Terrify", add +10 to Command Skill Tests to counter the effects of Fear.
In Social Conflicts, character gains +10 to Opposed Tests if they use the Intimidate Skill, however incur a -10 if using any other Skill or Fellowship.
